*description*: *ENTER SANDMAN!  While NORMAN OSBORN deals with the fallout of an attempt on his son Harry's life…  PETER PARKER struggles to keep himself together.  What better way to work out your problems than putting on the mask to take down FLINT MARKO: THE SANDMAN!*
*Spidey is cleaning up the mess that is his life after some of the most harrowing conflicts of his life. Electro isn't going to wait for Spidey to figure his problems out
*url*: though. A dangling thread from earlier in the run that you forgot was dangling starts to pull the sweater apart!*

*description*: *What should have been a simple altercation with Sandman turns VERY dark. A tale unbound by time itself threatens Spider-Man in never-before-seen ways!*
*Collects Spider-Man (2016) #234-240. The Sinister Six reborn! Miles Morales’ world has been shaken up lately
*url*: but nothing compares to what the mysterious Iron Spider and his new group of super villains are about to do. Sandman
column7: Electro and Bombshell(?!) have united — to make Spider-Man’s life a living hell! And unfortunately for those closest to our hero
column8: it’s not just his life that’s going to get obliterated. Miles’ friend Lana has been through so much and grown into a hero. But with her mother
column11: things look set to blow up for her — in a bad way! Miles faces his greatest challenge yet — as writer Brian Michael Bendis bids a fond farewell to one of his most beloved creations! What legacy will he leave for Miles Morales

*description*: *The Hobgoblin doesn't like following orders
*url*: but Iron Spider made a compelling case to join the Sinister Six. One of the perks? Killing Spider-Man!*

*description*: *SANDMAN doesn’t trust the leader of the new Sinister Six
*url*: and he’s ready to take matters into his own sands! Can SPIDER-MAN contain him AND fend off IRON SPIDER
*thumbnail*: who won’t ignore his vendetta against Miles and his family any longer?*

*title*: *SPIDER-MAN: WEBSPINNERS - THE COMPLETE COLLECTION TPB (Trade Paperback)*
*description*: *Collects Webspinners: Tales Of Spider-Man #1-18
*url*: Material From Shadows & Light (1998) #2-3. A host of comic book talents spin yarns across the web of Spidey history! Dive deep inside the goldfi sh bowl for a look at the early motivations of Mysterio! Solve the decades-old mystery of why the Silver Surfer abandoned his plan to attack mankind! Head back to Midtown High’s senior prom with ladies’ man Peter Parker — but who invited the Sandman? Chameleon spirals out of control
*year*: and a black-suited Spider-Man joins Silver Sable on a mission of international intrigue! And there are no positives to a trip to the Negative Zone — particularly when Cletus Kasady is along for the ride
column7: and Blastaar the Living Bomb-Burst is the welcoming party!*

*title*: *SPIDER-MAN: FRIENDLY NEIGHBORHOOD SPIDER-MAN BY PETER DAVID - THE COMPLETE COLLECTION TPB (Trade Paperback)*
*description*: *Collects Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man #5-23
*url*: Annual #1. Comics' greatest wisecracker plus one of the wittiest writers around should make for one very friendly neighborhood! But as Civil War rages
*thumbnail*: that's far from the case on Spidey's streets. Just as the present is filled with turmoil
*year*: his past and future will be turned upside down by a face he never thought he'd see again and a familiar foe's master plan! Then
column7: when the ongoing conflict leads Peter Parker to reveal his secret identity to the world
column8: his momentous decision will have  dramatic repercussions. Plus: Pete goes back in black when life takes a dark turn!*

*title*: *MARVEL UNIVERSE ULTIMATE SPIDER-MAN VS. THE SINISTER SIX VOL. 2 DIGEST (Trade Paperback)*
*description*: *Collects Marvel Universe Ultimate Spider-Man Vs. The Sinister Six #5-8. The hunt is on for the mole inside S.H.I.E.L.D.! Vulture's revelation rocks the trust between Spider-Man and his allies...but can the Vulture be trusted? Is Agent Venom really DOUBLE Agent Venom? With appearances by The Lizard
*year*: don't miss the next chapter in the saga of the Sinister 6!*

*description*: *After his work with the new FF wraps for the week
*url*: what can the original teenaged super hero teach the world's most at-risk group of super-powered teens? Find out when Spider-Man substitutes at the Avengers Academy!*

*description*: *Doctor Otto Octavius is dying
*url*: and the only man that can help him is Tony Stark. If Tony doesn't agree to help then Doc Ock will kill innocent people. Can Iron Man weigh the death of one madman against the lives of hundreds of innocents?*

*description*: *ORIGIN OF THE SPECIES PART 4 Everyone's favorite friendly neighborhood Spider-Man isn't so friendly tonight. No one knows that better than the criminals he's been taking down. Featuring Shocker
*ORIGIN OF THE SPECIES PART 2 Can Spidey hold off his greatest foes and keep the Osborn baby safe?*
*ORIGIN OF THE SPECIES PART 1 When Norman Osborn's baby is born
*url*: every villain on the planet wants the first ever strain of pure Goblin blood
*thumbnail*: leaving Spider-Man's friends and family exposed to a sinister plan.*

*description*: *Collects Giant-Size Fantastic Four #4; Giant-Size Avengers #1; Giant-Size Defenders #4; Giant-Size Super-Heroes #1
*thumbnail*: Giant-Size Creatures #1.  Giants roamed the Earth in those days
*year*: and now they're back! Witness the formation of the new X-Men and the old Invaders! The rapid return of the wartime runner called the Whizzer! The debut of the multiplying Marvel Knight Madrox! Spider-Man vs. the Man-Wolf! The Defenders vs. the Squadron Sinister! The tantalizing Tigra and more! Tales almost too tall to tell

*title*: *FANTASTIC FOUR VISIONARIES: GEORGE PEREZ VOL. 1 TPB (Trade Paperback)*
*description*: *Collects Fantastic Four (1961) #164-167
*year*: #184-186.  Before his cross-company fame for Disturbing Crises and Avenger Adventures
column7: Perez put the World's Greatest Super-Team through its paces - and first up was a fight with a fabulous fifties favorite! The Thing gets replaced in the FF
column8: but who's replacing Mr. Fantastic in...the Frightful Four? Also featuring the Incredible Hulk
column10: the High Evolutionary and costumed characters never seen before or since!*

*description*: *Collects Identity Disc #1-5.  Six of Marvel's most violent and cunning villains - Sabretooth
column7: Sandman and the Vulture - are forced to work together by a mysterious agent who somehow knows every dark and dirty secret in their violent lives. Their mission: to retrieve the nearly priceless Identity Disc - purported to contain the true identities
column8: the home addresses and even the credit reports of every hero in the Marvel Universe!*

*description*: *Different versions of the Sandman are emerging all across Jones Beach!*
*Spider-Man takes on Spring Break...Part Two!*

*title*: *SPIDER-MAN LEGENDS VOL. 1: TODD MCFARLANE BOOK 1 TPB (Trade Paperback)*

*description*: *Trying to get his life back on track
*url*: Peter tries to get a job. Of course
*thumbnail*: nothing can ever go according to plan when you're a super-hero. Spider-Man gets side-tracked when he gets involved with a tussle with Sandman

*description*: *Spider-Man is trapped in an elaborate illusion of Mesmero's making! And it's driving him insane!*
*Attack of the Trapster! Spider-Man lends some web-shooting hands to the Fantastic Four during their latest battle with the Frightful Four. Plus
*url*: an assassination plot against Senator Ward!*

*description*: *From Scarlet Spider...to SPIDER-MAN! Ben Reilly dons the mantle of the original wall-crawler
*url*: but soon finds it's true that with great power does come great responsibility!*

*description*: *A special 64-page anniversary issue! Aron the Rogue Watcher plucks villains from across the timestream to destroy the FF once and for all! But Aron himself must contend with one that is his equal - Uatu
*year*: the Fantastic Four at last pay final respects to their dear friend and leader

*description*: *The FF's battle with the Fearsome Foursome crashes headlong into the trial of Johnny Storm! But even though Johnny's not allowed to flame on
*year*: and the Avengers arrive to help out! It's a Marvel-wide melee for the ages!*

*description*: *The young Franklin Richards returns as a teenager
*url*: having spent years fighting in a war of the future! What plan does he have for the present day? And will the FF be able to figure it out before they're taken out by the deadly new villain squad known as the Fearsome Foursome!?*

*description*: *Sandman
*url*: one of Earth's Mightiest? Spider-Man and the Avengers trail an arms shipment after a tip from Sandman. But is the Avengers' new friend a man to be trusted?*

*description*: *Avengers of the past and present re-convene to decide on a new team roster. Plus
*url*: Cap makes an announcement that will leave readers reeling!*

*description*: the Spectacular Spider-Man (1976) #170*
the Spectacular Spider-Man (1976) #169*
*The newlyweds must make a pivotal decision- move to Kansas for Peter's new job
*url*: or stay in New York for MJ's burgeoning career? Silver Sable calls on Spider-Man and Sandman to take down neo-Nazi Franz Kraus once and for all!*

*description*: *The super-powered Sinister Syndicate has both Spider-Man and Silver Sable trapped on Coney Island! Who'll be left to pick up the pieces?*
*Will the Thing have any sympathy for Sandman while he's down on his luck and mentally unwell? As the Sandman weeps of his past to the Thing at a local bar
*url*: Grimm wrestles with whether or not the villain's sentiments are genuine.*

*description*: *Hydro-man is revealed to be behind Barney Wicker's assassination attempt; good thing Spider-Man got to Wicker in time! Sandman makes moves on Hydro-man's bar babe girlfriend
*thumbnail*: leading to a super-powered bar brawl! The three reconcile
column7: and tear up New York with a crime spree! Spider-Man's taking it to the docks
column8: to take out his two most ferocious foes.*

*description*: *Nova battles Sandman at his old high school in an attempt to save his classmate's older brother
*thumbnail*: Charles Rider's financial troubles send him down an uncertain path.*

*description*: *Sandman
*url*: under the control of Yellow Claw! Can Nova defeat the powerful duo of Sandman and Claw…and save his classmate?*

*description*: *The Thing
*url*: trapped in the Negative Zone! And after meeting Reed Richards of Counter-Earth
*thumbnail*: Ben's hope for escape looks ever bleaker.*

*description*: *The Frightful Four are hiring! Who will become the latest member of this nefarious crew? The answer will shock you!*
*The Impossible Man wreaks havoc in the Marvel Comics office! Stan "The Man" Lee and Jack Kirby guest-star. Will the Impossible Man land his own ongoing series?*
*Frustrated over Dr. Bolton's death
*url*: Spider-Man takes out his aggression on common criminals. But what happens when Spider-Man goes too far with a street thug? Plus
*thumbnail*: the return of Sandman! And this time
*year*: the villain finds himself in a criminal enclave equipped with cryogenic technology!*

*description*: *Following his battle with Jackal and a Spider-Clone
*url*: Spider-Man questions whether he is the real web-slinger or a clone injected with memories. Spidey seeks the help of Dr. Curt Connors
*thumbnail*: but before the results are revealed
*year*: Spencer Smythe arrives on the scene with new Spider-Slayer weaponry!*

*description*: *When it rains
*url*: it pours! The disheartened FF return to the Baxter Building sans Sue Storm
*thumbnail*: who has vowed to stay with Namor forever. But waiting for them is the Frightful Four

*description*: *John Jameson fears the worst when he starts experiencing headaches after being cured of the Moon-Stone's possession Featuring the return of two of Spider-Man's greatest foes; Morbius the Living Vampire
*Is this the end of the Frightful Four? Plus
*url*: the FF trembles at the might of...Thundra! Will this latest recruit hold the key to the Frightful Four's victory?*

*description*: *The Mandarin and Sandman are aligned against Hulk! With the oncoming evil multiplied
*url*: can the Gamma Green Giant withstand the storm? Especially when Betty Ross is used as a pawn in the Mandarin's game?*

*description*: *Bruce Banner's in deep trouble! Hurtling through space in a capsule without oxygen
*url*: Banner's life is measured down to mere moments. But will Bruce's scientific ingenuity be his saving grace? Plus

*description*: *The Sandman creates a sand storm all his own
*url*: as he escapes from his day in court! The Invisible Woman incapacitated! The Fantastic Four scattered! Chaos reigns supreme
*thumbnail*: as the Wizard makes his next move. In Latveria
*year*: Doctor Doom turns the tables on Silver Surfer.*

*description*: *The Frightful Four return
*url*: and this time they've brought their A-game. The villains have managed to strand the FF without resources! Are the Fantastic Four truly defeated?*

*description*: *The Frightful Four versus the Fantastic Four! The Wizard! Medusa! Sand Man! Trapster! Will the FF be overpowered by the brawn and brains of their toughest foes yet?*
*Spidey strikes back! Guest-starring the Human Torch and featuring such villains as the Sandman and the Evil Enforcers!*
*The end of Spider-Man? Sandman is in town
*url*: and Spider-Man is cringing in fear!*

*description*: *The First Appearance of the Sandman!  Spider-Man must contend with the villainous might of Sandman. But worst of all
*url*: Spidey has to deal with the dreaded...J. Jonah Jameson!*
